attributes.action: admit/realise that its actually politicians and their policies that do the most damage to the environment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
CO2 has so little effect on the ecology of the earth but somehow the politicians have turned it into a money making exercise. Real pollutants like complex hydrocarbons are the real dangers but would involve real change and loss of profits to properly manage.

Unfortunately this time "green wash" is not a conspiricy its a fact.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
